name: CastleViolence
description:
CastleViolence is an action-platformer and a short love letter to Castlevania. It's also my first ever project using GameMaker Studio 2. Hope you dig it!

Let me know what you think in the comments, or if you hit a bug.

CONTROLS

*** Gamepad recommended ***

Gamepad:

  • D-pad or analog stick to move
    • Up to enter doors
    • Down to drop from ledges
  • 'A' to jump
  • 'X' to whip

Keyboard:

  • Arrow keys to move
    • Up arrow to enter doors
    • Down arrow drops from ledges
  • Space to jump
  • 'F' to whip
